name: endogenous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
found or coming from within something, for example a system or a person's body or mind: Endogenous insulin levels decrease over time in people with type 2 diabetes. Opposite
exogenous specialized

Add to word list
Add to word list
used in economics to describe something that is inside a particular system, rather than outside that system: There are those who see the origins of the crisis as endogenous to the region.
